line.comment: * returns [TRUE] / [FALSE] depending if a new operation got started
* MultiInvasionStatus : 0 = race has no operation in progress, 1 = preparation phase, [sector] = attack phase
* we never want more than 4 BGs
* we only allow BGs with minimum strength of roughly an M2 or similar
* BG shall not be too far away
* did we get enough BGs? > BEGIN OPERATION
* sector gets a hidden claim restriction (Mayhem.IsClaimable)
* NPC sectors get claimed immediately so that player gets blocked from conquering and sees it
* create array of all adjacent jumpgates
* an active rallyGate local variable blocks retreat (Mayhem.Squadron.AssessRetreat) and changes behavior (Mayhem.Task.Squadron.BattleGroup)

sval.val: returns [TRUE] / [FALSE] depending if a new operation got started
MultiInvasionStatus : 0 = race has no operation in progress, 1 = preparation phase, [sector] = attack phase
we never want more than 4 BGs
we only allow BGs with minimum strength of roughly an M2 or similar
BG shall not be too far away
did we get enough BGs? > BEGIN OPERATION
sector gets a hidden claim restriction (Mayhem.IsClaimable)
NPC sectors get claimed immediately so that player gets blocked from conquering and sees it
create array of all adjacent jumpgates
an active rallyGate local variable blocks retreat (Mayhem.Squadron.AssessRetreat) and changes behavior (Mayhem.Task.Squadron.BattleGroup)
